Document with Images

This document contains various images to test the conversion service's ability to handle embedded images when converting between PDF and DOCX formats.

Conclusion

This document tests the ability of the conversion service to handle images with various positioning and sizes. The conversion should maintain image placement and text wrapping as accurately as possible when converting between PDF and DOCX formats.
